title: DISEASED RENGAR Skin or something like that
body: If rito comes up with the idea of making this skin i want them to change Rengar s  E to Ebola strike instead of bola strike( im not taking ebola as a joke )but  i think it would be brilliant .

replies.body:
Bargain Hunter Rengar. His weapon is a rolled up coupon book and his bola strike is a shopping cart. He's wearing a Hawaiin print shirt and reading glasses.
Also Guardian of the Sands Kha'zix came out so Rengar should get a Sand Stalker skin. His abilities would look the same but he would have desert garbs on like a hood that protects him from the sun and other things.
Maybe a doctor Rengar XD I'd buy it
This would be pretty hilarious. I'm on board, +1.
